messages.subject: Re: Uploaded Image info
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, Serizawa Kamo s site mentions Yoshimura Kanichiro and yes he was a kenjutsu teacher in the Shinsengumi AND I did find some book on him at amazon.co.jp
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, Serizawa Kamo's site mentions Yoshimura Kanichiro and yes he was
a kenjutsu teacher in the Shinsengumi AND I did find some book on him
at amazon.co.jp

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Uploaded Image info
messages.msgSnippet: Scans are from An Illustrated Guide to the Shinsengumi First image: Info about the Shiban or death squad . Hijikata in PMK mentions this in ep 20 or 21. It s
messages.messageBody:
Scans are from An Illustrated Guide to the Shinsengumi

First image: Info about the Shiban or "death squad". Hijikata in PMK mentions this in ep 20 or 21. It's a group of 4 people that head in first during a raid.

Second and Third Images: Info about Mibu Gishi Den's Yoshimura Kanichiro. I'm guessing someone asked if there was really someone in the Shinsengumi by that name.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
